pages.text: A cryptic entity of forgotten origin, the Ravenous Maw—or simply, the Maw—is a beast of endless hunger. It possesses a malleable form capable of twisting into new shapes, acquiring potent abilities as it mutates.)
This eldritch creature grows in power only by devouring the essence of specific monstrosities. (Seek the Stages section for forbidden knowledge on its evolution.

A starving Maw is a dormant one. Should its durability fall critically low, the beast will cease to function. To rekindle its strength, you must offer it a Feast. Combine the Maw with an accepted Feast within any crafting grid to mend its form. Be mindful that each offering restores a different measure of vitality. Do not neglect the beast's hunger.

The Maw's capacity for evolution is bound by its Stage. As the beast ascends to higher forms, its vessel expands, granting the strength to harbor a greater number of specific Mutations. Certain powers are malleable, awaiting your command to shape them. To commune with the beast and configure these malleable abilities, hold Shift + Right Click.
